title: NFL MVP Matthew Stafford says he'll return to Rams in 2026 during award acceptance speech

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: NFL MVP Matthew Stafford says he'll return to Rams in 2026 during award acceptance speech
sources.description: Stafford has committed to returning in 2026.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: NFL MVP Matthew Stafford announces he'll return to play for Rams in 2026 season
sources.description: Matthew Stafford broke a bit of news in his NFL MVP acceptance speech by announcing he'll return to play for the Rams in the 2026 NFL season.
